description.value: At 16th level, when entering a bloodrage you can choose one of the following spells and apply its effects to yourself: @Compendium[pf1.spells.br37848gchetel0q]{Beast Shape IV} (choose a creature your size or larger only), @Compendium[pf1.spells.iqcjiyi9leldfzxt]{Form of the Dragon I}, or @Compendium[pf1.spells.9pbl3ktd5oqejl19]{Transformation}. This is in addition to arcane bloodrage and greater arcane bloodrage, and otherwise works as those abilities.
